sentences.sentence: Next time don't loll out your tongue out.
sentences.translation: 下次可别伸出舌头来嘲笑人了。

sentences.sentence: Don't loll about in the street after school.
sentences.translation: 放学后不要在街上到处闲逛。

sentences.sentence: Donkey:Yes, but how funny it is you loll your tongue out !
sentences.translation: 是的，但是你把舌头伸出来很滑稽呢！
